block.p: AHERN-Rosemary Schildknecht of Oyster Bay, NY on June 13, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Frederick M. Loving mother of Veronica Ahern, Michael, Charles, Paul, Nora Ahern-Grose and Elizabeth Ahern-Quinn. Dear grandmother of Lauren Ahern, Brendan Quinn, Jordan Grose, Lydia Ahern, Mary Quinn, Jacqueline Grose and Claire Quinn. Visiting Thursday 2-4 and 7-9PM, Whitting Funeral Home, Glen Head, NY. Funeral Mass Friday 9:45 AM, St. Paul the Apostle Church, Brookville, NY. Interment Holy Rood Cemetery, Westbury, NY. In lieu of flowers contributions may be made to the Mother Mary Gabriel Scholarship Fund, C/O the Old Westbury School of the Holy Child, 25 Store Hill Road, Old Westbury, NY 11568
